name: proliferation
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the fact of something increasing a lot and suddenly in number or amount: The past two years have seen the proliferation of TV channels. nuclear weapons proliferation See
proliferate
More examplesFewer examplesThe proliferation of wireless and broadband services is continuing.The Internet encouraged the proliferation of Web-only retail companies.The proliferation of social media platforms has meant people can be constantly in touch in a variety of ways.
